task_detail: Enter data from paper forms into an Excel spreadsheet.
submission_info: Submit the completed Excel file via email to dataentry@company.com.

task_detail: Write a 500-word blog post on the topic of remote work productivity tips.
submission_info: Upload the blog post to the content management system (CMS).

task_detail: Create and schedule 10 social media posts for the company's Twitter and Facebook accounts.
submission_info: Provide the scheduled posts details in a Google Sheet and share it with social@company.com.

task_detail: Test the new mobile app features and report any bugs or issues.
submission_info: Submit the bug report using the company's bug tracking system.

task_detail: Design a new logo for the company's rebranding initiative.
submission_info: Send the logo design files (AI, PNG) to design@company.com.

task_detail: Conduct a survey and analyze data on customer preferences for the new product line.
submission_info: Submit the survey results and analysis report in PDF format to research@company.com.
